songs.title: Outro (Spoken Word)
songs.album: The Legacy: The Best of Big Pun
songs.lyrics:
[Big Pun]
On the first album I let everybody know who was the nicest, ya know what I'm saying? But the underground is so small, and I'mma take it to the next level, the whole world know who the nicest, ya know what I'm saying? Now you know, we finally get our due, ya know what I mean?
